name: Another Dream: Memories of Antinomies
description:
Hi everybody! Syoudre here, thank you for trying out this script! It involves on the Yorigami Sisters this time around

The story is some sort of a side-story to my previous game, Dreaming False Memories, where Reimu ended up in the

Concert of the Sun and confronts the Yorigami sisters all over again.

How to run the game:

-Optional: Config and set to your preferred configuration.

-Open th_dnh_ph3sx.exe (or th_dnh_ph3sx_legacy.exe)

-Optional: Go to Options and adjust the settings.

-Have fun!

Credits:

Another Dream: Memories of Antinomies

By Syoudre

~Until next time~
